questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2.10, bya police, ndakumirwa bigomba itara ry’ubururu rimyatsa mu mpande zose.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bihinga n’ibindi bikoresho byihariye bikoreshwa n’ibigo bipatana imirimo, iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa igihe cya nijoro cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bishobora kugaragazwa inyuma n’amatara 2 atukura, bipfa kuba bitarenza ibipimo bikurikira:
options: kutarenza umuvuduko wa km20 mu isaha
uburebure bwabyo habariwemo ibyo bitwaye bukaba butarengeje m6
A na B nibyo bisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B nibyo bisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bihinga n'ibikoresho byihariye bigaragazwa n'amatara 2 atukura inyuma iyo bitarenza km 20/h na m 6 uburebure.

questions.question: Iyo romoruki iziritse ku kinyamitende, velomoteri n’amapikipiki bidafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande uretse ikinyamitende na velomoteri bidafite umuyobozi, iyo uburumbarare bwayo cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bituma itara ry’ikinyabiziga gikurura ritagaragara igihe bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bigomba kugaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: itara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije riri kuri rumoruki inyuma
itara ry’icyatsi cyangwa ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije riri kuri rumoruki inyuma
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Romoruki igomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera/ry’umuhondo/icunga riri inyuma.

questions.question: Ku kinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntikigomba kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Igice kirenga ku biziga ntikirenga m 3.50 inyuma na m 1.70 imbere.

questions.question: Iyo amatara y’ikinyabiziga agomba gucanwa kandi igihe imizigo isumba impera y’ikinyabiziga ho metero irenga igice gihera cy’imizigo kigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: itara ritukura cyangwa akagarurarumuri ku mutuku ku manywa
agatambaro gatukura gafite nibura cm 50 z’uruhande mu ijoro
questions.explanation: Imizigo isumba impera igaragazwa n'itara ritukura ku manywa na gatambaro gatukura mu ijoro.

questions.question: Iyo imizigo igizwe n’ibinyampeke, ikawa, ipamba idatonoye, ibishara, ibyatsi, ibishami cyangwa ubwatsi bw’amatungo bidahambiriye uretse amapaki afunze, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera ku bipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Imizigo y'ibinyampeke n'ibindi bidahambiriye yemerewe ubugari bwa m 2.75.

questions.question: Uretse mu mijyi kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu n’abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko itatu ni:
questions.explanation: Uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko 3 ni toni 12 ahatari mu mijyi.

questions.question: Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n’iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara rituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy’uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rifite amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ryerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso ry'icyatsi kibisi.

questions.question: Ikinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana bifite imitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye mu bugari bwayo ni ukuvuga imitambiko yihindukiza kucyo ifungiyeho, uburebure bwabyo ntibugomba kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Uburebure ntarengwa ni m 11 ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye.

questions.question: Bumwe muri ubu bwoko bwa feri ituma imodoka iguma aho iri uko yaba yikoreye kose ku muzamuko cyangwa ku gacuri bya 16%, imyanya ya feri igomba gufata igakomeza kwegera kuburyo bw’ibyuma niyo umuyobozi yaba atarimo:
questions.explanation: Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini ikomeza imodoka ku muzamuko/gacuri.

questions.question: Utugarurarumuri turi mu mbavu z’ikinyabiziga tugomba kugira ibara rikurikira:
questions.explanation: Utugarurarumuri mu mbavu tugomba kuba umuhondo.

questions.question: Romoruki zifite ubugari ntarengwa bwa cm 80 zishobora gushyirwaho akagarurarumuri kamwe gusa iyo zikuruwe n’ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Romoruki zifite ubugari ≤ cm 80 zishobora akagarurarumuri kamwe ku ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga.

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ibara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo agomba, nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, kumurika mu muhanda mu ntera ya m 100 nibura imbere y’ikinyabiziga, ariko ku binyabiziga bifite moteri itarengeje za sentimetero kibe 125 iyo ntera igira ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ku binyabiziga bifite moteri ≤ 125 cm³, amatara maremare akumurika m 100 nibura.

questions.question: Iyo banyuze iruhande rw’inkomyi abanyamaguru bagomba gukikira banyuze mu muhanda, abayobozi bagomba gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa m 1 nibura hagati yabo nayo. Iyo ibyo bidashobora kubahirizwa kandi umunyamaguru akaba anyura hafi yiyo nkomyi, umuyobozi agomba kuyikikira afite umuvuduko utarengeje ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Umuvuduko utarenga 20 km/h igihe umuyobozi akikira abanyamaguru hafi y'inkomyi.

questions.question: Guhagarara akanya gato no guhagarara akanya kanini bibujijwe cyane cyane aha hakurikira:
options: mu ruhande ruteganye n’urwo ikindi kinyabiziga gihagazemo akanya gato cyangwa kanini
ku mihanda ibisikanirwamo, iyo ubugari bw’umwanya w’ibinyabiziga ugomba gutuma bibisikana butagifite m12
questions.explanation: Guhagarara akanya gato/kanini birabujijwe mu byerekezo byose byavuzwe.

questions.question: Amatara ndangambere n’aya ndanganyuma y’imodoka zitarengeje m 6 z’uburebure na m 2 z’ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi nta kindi kinyabiziga kiziritseho ashobora gusimburwa n’amatara akurikira, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw’umuhanda:
questions.explanation: Mu nsisiro, amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini ashobora gusimbura amatara ndangambere/ndanganyuma ku modoka zitarenga m 6 uburebure na m 2 ubugari.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe nuko ibihe bimeze nk’igihe cy’igihu cyangwa cy’imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, imirongo y’ingabo z’igihugu zigendera kuri gahunda n’utundi dutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw’abanyeshuri bari ku murongo bayobowe na mwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu barenze umwe, bagaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: imbere ni itara ryera ritwariwe ku ruhande rw’ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’imbere hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
inyuma ni itara umuhondo ritwariwe ku ruhande rw’ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’inyuma hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Mu bihe bitaboneka neza, imirongo y’ingabo cyangwa abanyeshuri igaragazwa n'itara ryera imbere na ry’umuhondo inyuma.

questions.question: Imizigo yikorewe n’amagare, velomoteri, amapikipiki, ibinyamitende by’ibiziga bitatu nibyo ibiziga bine bifite cyangwa bidafite moteri inyuma ntishobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Imizigo yikorewe n'amagare, velomoteri, pikipiki n'ibinyamitende ntishobora kurenza cm 50 inyuma.

questions.question: Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa hafi y'inguni y'ibumoso y'ikinyabiziga.

questions.question: Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa utugarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze kuburyo igice cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kitaba kiri hasi ya cm 40 kuva ku butaka igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku matara akurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Amatara kamenabihu na yo gusubira inyuma ntibikurikizwa ku iteganya ry'igice cyo hasi ≥ cm 40.

questions.question: Iyo tumuritswe n’amatara y’urugendo y’i kinyabiziga utugarurarumuri tugomba n’ijoro, igihe ijuru rikeye kubonwa n’umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Utugarurarumuri tugomba kubonwa muri m 150 n'umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga gihagaritse amatara y’urugendo.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri, hatarimo velomoteri n’ibinyabiziga bidapakiye umuvuduko wabyo udashobora kurenga km 50 mu isaha ahateganye bigomba kuba bifite ibikoresho by’ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri bishobora kurenga 50 km/h bigomba kugira ihoni ryumvikana muri m 100.

questions.question: Ahatari mu nsisiro ibyapa biburira n’ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere bigomba gushyirwa mu ntera ikurikira y’ahantu habyerekana:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa biburira n'ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere bigomba gushyirwa muri m 150–200 imbere y'ahantu habo.

questions.question: Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona ku buryo bukurikira:
options: babona iburyo bwabo iby’ibara ritukura cyangwa ibisa n’icunga rihishije
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Inkombe zigaragazwa n'ibikoresho ngarurarumuri bigaragara neza ku bagenzi (ritukura/icunga iburyo, ryera ibumoso).

questions.question: Ahatari mu nsisiro, umuyobozi wese ugenza ikinyabiziga kimwe cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikomatanye bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga ibiro 3500 cyangwa bifite uburebure bwite burenga metero 10 agomba, keretse iyo anyuze cyangwa agiye kunyura ku bindi binyabiziga, gusiga hagati y’ikinyabiziga cye n’iki muri imbere umwanya uhagije kugirango ibinyabiziga bimuhiseho bishobore kuhigobeka bidateje impanuka igihe bibaye ngombwa ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa mu bihe bikurikira:
options: mu gihe ibigendera mu muhanda ari byinshi kimwe no mu duce tw'inzira nyabagendwa aho kunyuranaho bibujijwe
igihe ibigendera mu muhanda ari byinshi
mu duce tw’inzira nyabagendwa aho kunyuranaho bibujijwe
questions.explanation: Umwanya uhagije hagati y'ibinyabiziga ugomba gusigwa uretse mu bihe byavuzwe (traffic dense cyangwa aho kunyuranaho bibujijwe).

questions.question: Amatara ndangacyerekezo agomba kuba agizwe n’ibintu bifashe ku rumuri rumyasa, biringaniye ku buryo bigira umubare utari igiharwe ku mpande z’imbere n’inyuma z’ikinyabiziga ayo matara aba afite amabara akurikira:
options: amatara y’imbere aba yera cyangwa ari umuhondo
ayinyuma aba atukura cyangwa asa n’icunga rihishije
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Amatara ndangacyerekezo y’imbere yera/umuhondo, ay’inyuma atukura/icunga rihishije.

questions.question: Amahoni y’ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri agomba kohereza ijwi ry’injyana imwe rikomeza kandi ridacengera amatwi ariko ibinyabiziga bikurikira bishobora kugira ihoni ridasanzwe ridahuye n’ibivuzwe haruguru:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga ndakumirwa n’ibikora ku mihanda bishobora kugira ihoni ridasanzwe.

questions.question: Icyapa kibuza kunyura kubindi binyabiziga byose uretse ibinyamitende ibiri n’amapikipiki adafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande gifite ibimenyetso by’amabara akurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Icyapa kibuza kunyura ku binyabiziga byose uretse ibinyamitende ibiri n’amapikipiki gifite umutuku n’umukara.

questions.question: Icyapa kivuga ko hatanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi kirangwa n’ubuso bw’ibara rikurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo kutanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi gifite ubuso bw’umweru.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira ibikoresho by’ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera ya m 20:
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga byavuzwe bigomba ihoni ryumvikana muri m 50 cyangwa byinshi, ntabwo m 20.

questions.question: Imirongo y’ingabo z’igihugu zigendera kuri gahunda n’utundi dutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw’abanyeshuri iyo bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m200, bagaragazwa ni itara ryera imbere naho inyuma ni itara ry’umutuku ariko iyo uburebure bwiyo mirongo cyangwa bw’utwo dutsiko burenga m6 impande zatwo cyangwa zayo zigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
questions.explanation: Iyo uburebure burenga m 6, impande zigaragazwa n'amatara yera, y’umuhondo, cyangwa icunga rihishije.

questions.question: Amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma y’imodoka zitarengeje m 6 z’uburebure na m 2 z’ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi nta kindi kinyabiziga kiziritseho ashobora gusimburwa n’amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw’umuhanda. Ayo matara arangwa n’amabara akurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Mu nsisiro, amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini arangwa n’umweru/umuhondo imbere na umutuku/umuhondo inyuma.

questions.question: Amatara ndangaburumbarare agomba kubonwa nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye n’umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ya :
questions.explanation: Amatara ndangaburumbarare agomba kubonwa muri m 200 nibura nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Uretse ku byerekeye imihanda iromboreje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda yimodoka igice cy’umuhanda kiri hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera ucibwa ku muhanda ngo ugaragaze inkombe mpimbano zawo kigenewe ibi bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Igice cy’umuhanda hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera ucibwa kigenewe guhagararwamo umwanya muto n’umunini.

questions.question: Ibimenyetso by’agateganyo bigizwe n’imitemeri y’ibara risa n’icunga rihishije bishobora gusimbura ibi bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibimenyetso by’agateganyo by’icunga rihishije bishobora gusimbura imirongo yera irombereje idacagaguye n’icagaguye.

questions.question: Iyo bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200 imodoka zikuruwe n’inyamaswa, ingorofani, inyamaswa zitwaye imizigo cyangwa zigenderwamo kimwe n’amatungo bigomba kurangwa na :
options: imbere ni itara ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije
questions.explanation: Imodoka zikuruwe n’inyamaswa zigaragazwa n'itara ryera/ry’umuhondo/icunga imbere na ritukura inyuma.

questions.question: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini, iyo gihagaze mu mwanya wo kuruhande wagenewe abanyamaguru, kugirango bashobore kugenda batagombye kunyura mu muhanda, umuyobozi agombye kubasigira akayira gafite byibura ibipimo bikurikira by’ubugari:
questions.explanation: Umuyobozi agombye gusigira akayira gafite ubugari bwa m 1 ku banyamaguru.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zagenewe gutwara abantu cyirangwa n’ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zitwara abantu gifite ubuso bw’ubururu.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ko inzira giteyeho mu ntangiriro idakomeza kigaragazwa n’ikirango (ikimenyetso) cy’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’inzira idakomeza gifite ikirango cy’umweru n’umutuku.

questions.question: Buri modoka yagenewe gutwara abantu, ariko umubare wabo ntarengwa ukaba munsi ya 6 umuyobozi abariwemo igomba kugira imikandara yo kurinda ibyago igenewe aba bakurikira:
options: ishobora no kugira imikandara kuzindi ntebe z’inyuma
questions.explanation: Modoka ifite abagenzi batarenze 6 (umuyobozi abariwemo) igomba imikandara ku ntebe zose.

questions.question: Usibye ibinyabiziga by'ingabo z'Igihugu, Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri kiriho ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa ikindi cyose gituma gikoreshwa mu gutera cyangwa mu kwitabara ntigishobora kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa kidafite uruhushya rwihariye. Urwo ruhushya rutangwa naba bakurikira:
questions.explanation: Uruhushya rw’ibinyabiziga bifite ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa bitanga ibyago rutangwa na Minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu.

questions.question: Iyo umukumbi ugizwe n’amatungo maremare arenze ane cyangwa amatungo magufi arenze atandatu mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo hatakibona neza kuburyo umuyobozi abona muri m 200 ugomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:
options: itara ry’urumuri rwera cyangwa rusa n’icunga rihishije imbere y’umukumbi
itara ry’urumuri rutukura cyangwa umuhondo ritwawe inyuma y’umukumbi
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Umukumbi w’amatungo ugomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera/icunga imbere na ritukura/umuhondo inyuma mu bihe bitaboneka neza.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500. Iyi bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga biherekeranye mu butumwa bishobora kugabanwamo amatsinda atonze umurongo atarengeje m 50 z’uburebure kandi hagati yayo hakaba byibura m 50 ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa kubinyabiziga bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bya police n’abasirikare biherekeranyije mu nsisiro ntibikurikizwa ku iteganya ry’uburebure.

questions.question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa nacyo gikuruye ikindi uburebure bw’ibikururwa bukaba burenga m 18 hatabariwemo icyo kinyabiziga cya mbere kiziritseho hagomba ibi bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iyo uburebure bw’ibikururwa burenga m 18, hagomba umuherekeza ku kinyabiziga cya kabiri cyangwa abaherekeza babiri.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira ntibitegetswe kugira ibimenyetso bibyerekana iyo byambukiranya umuhanda cyangwa bigenda ku ruhande rwawo:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga by’abana n’abamugaye ntibitegetswe ibimenyetso byo kwambukiranya umuhanda.

questions.question: Icyapa cy’inyongera kigaragaza ikibanza cy’ingando cyangwa cy’abantu benshi bagendera ku nyamaswa kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’inyongera cy’ikibanza cy’ingando cyangwa abantu benshi bagendera ku nyamaswa gifite ubururu (ubuso), umweru n’umukara (ikirango).

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ahantu amategeko y’ Umuhanda urombeje w’ibice byinshi atangirira gukurikizwa, kirangwa n’ibirango (ibimenyetso) by’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo gutangira amategeko y’umuhanda urombeje w’ibisate byinshi gifite ikirango cy’umweru n’umutuku.

questions.question: Igihe ikorwa ry’imirimo ribangamiye cyane cyangwa buke uburyo bwo kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa, ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye, zingana zifite uruhande rwa metero 0.30
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa n'icyapa cyera cya mpande enye (cm 30 uruhande) n'uruzitiro ku mpera y’iburyo.

questions.question: Iyo mu muhanda, imirimo yihariye ubugari butuma abayobozi bagomba kuva mu mwanya wabo usanzwe kugirango bakomeze urugendo, ahategetswe kunyurwa hagaragazwa n’ikimenyetso gishyirwa aho imirimo irangirira mu ruhande rugenderwamo. Icyo kimenyetso kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
options: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umutuku n’umukara
questions.answer: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
questions.explanation: Ikimenyetso cyo kunyurwa aho imirimo irangirira gifite umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ko hari amabwiriza yihariye mu buryo bwo kugendera mu cyambu cyangwa ku kibuga cy’indege giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
options: ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umukara
ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
ishusho y’uruziga mu ibara ry’ubururu ni ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.answer: ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’amabwiriza yihariye mu cyambu/kibuga cy’indege gifite ishusho mpandenye, ubuso ubururu n’ikirango cyera.

questions.question: Nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba gutuma izo numero zisomerwa nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ribonesha numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba kugaragara mu ntera ya m 20 nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Ibyapa byerekana icyago cyidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa aho berekeza umuhanda nk’igihe cy’impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu muhanda birangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa by’icyago cyidahoraho (impanuka, imirimo) birangwa n’umweru n’umukara.

questions.question: Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y’ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
options: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Kubangamira imigendere isanzwe birabujijwe kubera kugabanya umuvuduko budasanzwe cyangwa gukacira feri bitari ngombwa.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma itara ry’ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara ry’umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara risa n’icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma
questions.explanation: Romoruki igomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera, ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije inyuma.

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
options: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe hose kandi umuyobozi ashobora kubona nibura mu ntera ingana na metero 200
iyo ikinyabiziga gikurikiye mu ntambwe zitagera muri m100 keretse iyo umuyobozi wacyo ashaka kunyura kucyo akurikiye acana azimya vuba vuba amatara maremare
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Amatara maremare azimwa iyo umuhanda umurikiwe neza (m 200) cyangwa iyo ugiye kubisikana n’ikinyabiziga gikurikiye.

questions.question: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bidatuma umuyobozi abona neza imbere ye, uwo muyobozi agomba gukora ibi bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bituma umuyobozi adabona neza, agomba gushaka umuherekeza cyangwa gukurura ikinyabiziga.

questions.question: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere cyangwa imitunganyirize bwite y’aho, ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini igomba kuba iri aha hakurikira:
options: mu kaboko k’iburyo hakurikijwe aho yaganaga uretse igihe ari mu muhanda w’icyerekezo kimwe
ahegereye bishobotse akayira k’abanyamaguru iyo umuhanda ugafite ariko umwanya w’ibiziga n’akayira ntube urenga santimetero 50
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ikinyabiziga/inyamaswa ihagaze igomba kuba ku ruhande rw’iburyo cyangwa hafi y’akayira k’abanyamaguru (ntibirenze cm 50).

questions.question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaritswe n’ijoro ku buryo abayobozi bakigana badashobora kumenya ko kibabereye imbogamizi, kigomba kurangirwa kure n’ikimenyetso cyabigenewe kiri ahantu hagaragara kugirango kiburire hakiri kare abandi bayobozi baza bagisanga, ariko ntibireba ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ikinyabiziga gihagaritswe n’ijoro kigomba kurangirwa n’ikimenyetso, uretse velomoteri n’ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga.

questions.question: Abanyamaguru batatanye cyangwa bagize udutsiko tudafatanyije gahunda kandi batanayobowe n’umwarimu bategetswe kunyura mu tuyira turi ku mpande z’umuhanda no ku nkengero zigiye hejuru uretse ubutaka butsindagiye butandukanya imihanda ibiri bwo kunyurwamo gusa n’aba bakurikira:
options: abanyamaguru bashaka guhagarara akanya gato igihe bambukiranya umuhanda
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Abanyamaguru batatanye cyangwa batayobowe n’umwarimu bagomba kunyura mu tuyira, uretse abanyamaguru benshi cyangwa bashaka guhagarara akanya gato.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500, iyo bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa bishobora kugabanywamo amatsinda atonze umurongo utarengeje ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije bigabanywamo amatsinda y’uburebure butarenga m 50, hagati y’amatsinda m 50.

questions.question: Ibyapa byereka inkomane y’inzira nyabagendwa n’inzira ya gariyamoshi bigomba iteka kumurikwa cyangwa kugarura urumuri ku buryo bigaragarira nibura mu ntera ikurikira igihe ijuru rikeye:
questions.explanation: Inkomane y’inzira nyabagendwa n’gariyamoshi igaragazwa mu ntera ya m 200 igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Imbibi ziri ku mpera z’ubwihugiko bw’abanyamaguru kandi ziri mu muhanda kimwe n’imbibi n’ibindi bikoresho bigenewe gutuma bagenda mu muhanda nta muvundo zisigwa irangi ry’ibara rikurikira:
questions.explanation: Imbibi z’ubwihugiko bw’abanyamaguru zisigwa irangi ry’umweru ngarurarumuri.

questions.question: Kugirango ikinyabiziga kive ahantu hari urwondo cyangwa hanyerera bidasanzwe hashobora gukoreshwa uburyo bukurikira:
options: inziga zishobora gushyirwaho iminyururu irwanya ubunyerere
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Mu rwondo cyangwa ahanverera, inziga zishobora gushyirwaho udushyundu cyangwa iminyururu irwanya ubunyerere.

questions.question: Iyo imizigo igizwe n’ibinyampeke, ikawa, amakara, ubwatsi bw’amatungo bidahambiriye, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera kuri m2 na cm75 ariko iyo iyo mizigo ijyanwa mu karere katarenga km25 uvuye aho yapakiriwe, usibye mu nsisiro, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera ku bipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Mu karere katarenga km 25, ubugari bw’imizigo y’ibinyampeke bushobora kugera m 3.

questions.question: Mu mujyi no ku mihanda y’igihugu igenwa na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu, ubwikorere ntarengwa ku ikamyo iyo ariyo yose ntibushobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ubwikorere ntarengwa ku ikamyo ni toni 24 mu mujyi n’imihanda y’igihugu.

questions.question: Iyo bitewe n’imiterere y’ahantu intera itandukanya icyapa n’ahantu habi iri munsi ya m150 ku buryo bugaragara, iyo ntera yerekanishwa icyapa cy’inyongera giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’inyongera cyerekana intera munsi ya m 150 gifite urukiramende rufite ubuso bw’umweru.

questions.question: Nijoro, amatara yo kubisikana y’ibara ryera cyangwa y’umuhondo agomba, igihe ijoro rikeye kumurika mu muhanda nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Amatara yo kubisikana (dipped/high beam) agomba kumurika mu ntera ya m 100 nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Ikintu cyose cyatuma hahindurwa ibyanditse bireba nyirikarita cyangwa ibiranga ikinyabiziga kigomba kumenyeshwa ibiro by’umusoro haba mu magambo cyangwa mu ibaruwa ishinganye ibyo bikorwa mu gihe kingana gute:
questions.explanation: Ibindi byanditse bireba nyir’ikinyabiziga (numero, ibirango) bigomba kumenyeshwa mu minsi 15.

questions.question: Kugirango berekane ahantu habi cyane, hakoreshwa ikimenyetso cy’itara ry’umuhondo rimyasa, rivuga uburenganzira bwo gutambuka icyo kimenyetso barushijeho kwitonda. Ese icyo kimenyetso gihindura iki ku mategeko agenga gutambuka mbere:
options: abatwaye ibinyabiziga binini nibo batambuka mbere
questions.explanation: Itara ry’umuhondo rimyasa ryerekana kwitonda cyane ntirihindura uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere.

questions.question: Romoruki zifite ubugari ntarengwa bwa sentimetero 80 zishobora gushyirwaho akagarurarumuri kamwe gusa iyo zikuruwe n’ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Romoruki zifite ubugari ≤ cm 80 zishobora akagarurarumuri kamwe ku binyabiziga bimwe (velomoteri, ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga).

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ibara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo agomba nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye kumurika mu ntera ikurikira ku binyabiziga bifite moteri itarengeje ingufu zigera kuri sentimetero kibe 125
questions.explanation: Ku binyabiziga bifite moteri ≤ 125 cm³, amatara maremare akumurika m 75 nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200, ibinyabiziga cyangwa imitwaro bifite ubugari burenga m 2.50 iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: iyo bibaye ngombwa no ku mpera y’amabondo y’ikinyabiziga cyangwa y’imitwaro ni itara ndangaburumbarare risa n’icunga rihishije cyangwa ry’umuhondo
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga/imitwaro bifite ubugari > m 2.50 bigaragazwa n'amatara abiri atukura inyuma na ndangaburumbarare ku mpera.

questions.question: Igice cy’umuhanda kiri hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ugaragaza inkombe mpimbano y’umuhanda kiba kigenewe ibi bikurikira:
options: guhagararwamo umwanya muto n’umunini ndetse no kumihanda irombereje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda y’imodoka
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Igice hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera ucibwa kigenewe guhagararwamo umwanya muto n’umunini.

questions.question: Iminyururu n’ibindi byuma bifashisha bishobora kuvanwaho cyangwa binagana, hatabariwemo ibimenyetso byerekana ibyerekezo bigomba gutungurwa ku kinyabiziga ku buryo igihe byizunguza bitarenga impande zihera uburumbarare bw’ikinyabiziga kandi ibyo byuma bifashisha ntibigomba gukururuka ku butaka ariko ibyo ntibibujijwe ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
options: ibinyabiziga bitwaye ibintu bidashobora gufata inkongi
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iminyururu n’ibindi byuma bifashisha ntibibujijwe ku mashini zihinga n’ibinyabiziga bitwaye ibintu bidashobora gufata inkongi.

questions.question: Ku binyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Igice kirenga ku biziga ntikirenga m 3 inyuma na m 2.70 imbere.

questions.question: Uretse bibonewe uruhushya, ubundi birabujijwe gushyira no gukomeza kugendesha imodoka cyangwa romoruki mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo uburemere bw’ibyikorewe burenze uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe n’ikarita iranga ikinyabiziga ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Birabujijwe kugendesha ibinyabiziga by’uburemere burenze ntarengwa uretse bibonewe uruhushya, ariko ntibikurikizwa ku police, bihinga n’imashini zubaka imihanda.

questions.question: Gushyira mu muhanda ku buryo budasanzwe ibinyabiziga bikururana birenze bitatu bigomba gutangirwa uruhusa, uretse imashini ihinga iyo zigenda uregendo rutarenze km 25, ibinyabiziga bikururana bitwaye ibyamamazwa n’ibindi biteganwa n’iri teka ariko igiteranyo cy’uburebure bw’ibyo binyabiziga bikururana ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bikururana birenze bitatu bigomba uruhusa, uretse imashini ihinga (≤ km 25), uburebure bwazo ntiburenga m 25.

questions.question: Ibinyamitende itatu bifite moteri bigomba kugira amatara akurikira:
options: amatara abiri ndangambere n’amatara abiri ndanganyuma yerekana ko ikinyabiziga gihagaze
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyamitende itatu bifite moteri bigomba amatara abiri ndangambere/ndanganyuma na utugarurarumuri tubiri.

questions.question: Ibyapa bibuza n’ibitegeka bikurikizwa gusa aha hakurikira:
options: mu gice cy’inzira nyabagendwa kiri hagati yaho bishinze n’inkomane ikurikiyeho ku ruhande rw’inzira bishinzeho
ibyo byapa bishyirwaho hakurikijwe intera ibitandukanya
B na C ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: B na C ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibyapa bibuza n’ibitegeka bikurikizwa mu gice cy’inzira nyabagendwa hagati y’inkomane n’intera ibitandukanya.

questions.question: Icyapa cy’inyongera kerekana aho bagobokera ibinyabiziga kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo kubobokera ibinyabiziga gifite umweru (ubuso), umukara n’ubururu (ikirango).

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana uburebure bw’igice cyatera ibyago cyangwa bw’ahantu amabwiriza y’icyo cyapa agomba gukurikizwa kirangwa n’ubuso n’ibimenyetso bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’ahantu cyatera ibyago cyangwa cy’amabwiriza yihariye gifite ubuso ubururu n’ikimenyetso cy’umweru n’umukara.

questions.question: Umurongo w’umuhondo ucagaguye uciye ku nkombe nyayo y’umuhanda, umusezero w’inzira y’abanyamaguru cyangwa w’inkengero y’umuhanda yegutse uvuga ibi bikurikira:
options: guhagarara umwanya muto birabujijwe ku burebure bw’uwo murongo
guhagarara umwanya muto n’umunini birabujijwe ku burebure bw’uwo murongo
aho bahagarara umwanya munini cyangwa muto
questions.answer: aho bahagarara umwanya munini cyangwa muto
questions.explanation: Umurongo w’umuhondo ucagaguye ku nkombe werekana ko guhagarara umwanya munini cyangwa muto birabujijwe ku burebure bwawo.

questions.question: Ku binyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Igice kirenga ku biziga ntikirenga m 3.40 inyuma na m 2.50 imbere.

questions.question: Iki cyapa cyerekana ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zagenewe gutwara abantu cyirangwa n’ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zitwara abantu gifite ubuso bw’ubururu.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zagenewe gutwara abantu cyirangwa n’ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zitwara abantu gifite ubuso bw’ubururu.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ko inzira giteyeho mu ntangiriro idakomeza kigaragazwa n’ikirango (ikimenyetso) cy’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’inzira idakomeza gifite ikirango cy’umweru n’umutuku.

questions.question: Buri modoka yagenewe gutwara abantu, ariko umubare wabo ntarengwa ukaba munsi ya 6 umuyobozi abariwemo igomba kugira imikandara yo kurinda ibyago igenewe aba bakurikira:
options: ishobora no kugira imikandara kuzindi ntebe z’inyuma
questions.explanation: Modoka ifite abagenzi batarenze 6 (umuyobozi abariwemo) igomba imikandara ku ntebe zose.

questions.question: Usibye ibinyabiziga by'ingabo z'Igihugu, Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri kiriho ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa ikindi cyose gituma gikoreshwa mu gutera cyangwa mu kwitabara ntigishobora kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa kidafite uruhushya rwihariye. Urwo ruhushya rutangwa naba bakurikira:
questions.explanation: Uruhushya rw’ibinyabiziga bifite ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa bitanga ibyago rutangwa na Minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu.

questions.question: Iyo umukumbi ugizwe n’amatungo maremare arenze ane cyangwa amatungo magufi arenze atandatu mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo hatakibona neza kuburyo umuyobozi abona muri m 200 ugomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:
options: itara ry’urumuri rwera cyangwa rusa n’icunga rihishije imbere y’umukumbi
itara ry’urumuri rutukura cyangwa umuhondo ritwawe inyuma y’umukumbi
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Umukumbi w’amatungo ugomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera/icunga imbere na ritukura/umuhondo inyuma mu bihe bitaboneka neza.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500. Iyi bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga biherekeranye mu butumwa bishobora kugabanwamo amatsinda atonze umurongo atarengeje m 50 z’uburebure kandi hagati yayo hakaba byibura m 50 ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa kubinyabiziga bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bya police n’abasirikare biherekeranyije mu nsisiro ntibikurikizwa ku iteganya ry’uburebure.

questions.question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa nacyo gikuruye ikindi uburebure bw’ibikururwa bukaba burenga m 18 hatabariwemo icyo kinyabiziga cya mbere kiziritseho hagomba ibi bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iyo uburebure bw’ibikururwa burenga m 18, hagomba umuherekeza ku kinyabiziga cya kabiri cyangwa abaherekeza babiri.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira ntibitegetswe kugira ibimenyetso bibyerekana iyo byambukiranya umuhanda cyangwa bigenda ku ruhande rwawo:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga by’abana n’abamugaye ntibitegetswe ibimenyetso byo kwambukiranya umuhanda.

questions.question: Icyapa cy’inyongera kigaragaza ikibanza cy’ingando cyangwa cy’abantu benshi bagendera ku nyamaswa kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’inyongera cy’ikibanza cy’ingando cyangwa abantu benshi bagendera ku nyamaswa gifite ubururu (ubuso), umweru n’umukara (ikirango).

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ahantu amategeko y’ Umuhanda urombeje w’ibice byinshi atangirira gukurikizwa, kirangwa n’ibirango (ibimenyetso) by’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo gutangira amategeko y’umuhanda urombeje w’ibisate byinshi gifite ikirango cy’umweru n’umutuku.

questions.question: Igihe ikorwa ry’imirimo ribangamiye cyane cyangwa buke uburyo bwo kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa, ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye, zingana zifite uruhande rwa metero 0.30
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa n'icyapa cyera cya mpande enye (cm 30 uruhande) n'uruzitiro ku mpera y’iburyo.

questions.question: Iyo mu muhanda, imirimo yihariye ubugari butuma abayobozi bagomba kuva mu mwanya wabo usanzwe kugirango bakomeze urugendo, ahategetswe kunyurwa hagaragazwa n’ikimenyetso gishyirwa aho imirimo irangirira mu ruhande rugenderwamo. Icyo kimenyetso kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
options: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umutuku n’umukara
questions.answer: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
questions.explanation: Ikimenyetso cyo kunyurwa aho imirimo irangirira gifite umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ko hari amabwiriza yihariye mu buryo bwo kugendera mu cyambu cyangwa ku kibuga cy’indege giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
options: ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umukara
ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
ishusho y’uruziga mu ibara ry’ubururu ni ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.answer: ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’amabwiriza yihariye mu cyambu/kibuga cy’indege gifite ishusho mpandenye, ubuso ubururu n’ikirango cyera.

questions.question: Nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba gutuma izo numero zisomerwa nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ribonesha numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba kugaragara mu ntera ya m 20 nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Ibyapa byerekana icyago cyidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa aho berekeza umuhanda nk’igihe cy’impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu muhanda birangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa by’icyago cyidahoraho (impanuka, imirimo) birangwa n’umweru n’umukara.

questions.question: Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y’ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
options: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Kubangamira imigendere isanzwe birabujijwe kubera kugabanya umuvuduko budasanzwe cyangwa gukacira feri bitari ngombwa.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma itara ry’ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara ry’umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara risa n’icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma
questions.explanation: Romoruki igomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera, ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije inyuma.

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
options: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe hose kandi umuyobozi ashobora kubona nibura mu ntera ingana na metero 200
iyo ikinyabiziga gikurikiye mu ntambwe zitagera muri m100 keretse iyo umuyobozi wacyo ashaka kunyura kucyo akurikiye acana azimya vuba vuba amatara maremare
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Amatara maremare azimwa iyo umuhanda umurikiwe neza (m 200) cyangwa iyo ugiye kubisikana n’ikinyabiziga gikurikiye.

questions.question: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bidatuma umuyobozi abona neza imbere ye, uwo muyobozi agomba gukora ibi bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bituma umuyobozi adabona neza, agomba gushaka umuherekeza cyangwa gukurura ikinyabiziga.

questions.question: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere cyangwa imitunganyirize bwite y’aho, ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini igomba kuba iri aha hakurikira:
options: mu kaboko k’iburyo hakurikijwe aho yaganaga uretse igihe ari mu muhanda w’icyerekezo kimwe
ahegereye bishobotse akayira k’abanyamaguru iyo umuhanda ugafite ariko umwanya w’ibiziga n’akayira ntube urenga santimetero 50
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ikinyabiziga/inyamaswa ihagaze igomba kuba ku ruhande rw’iburyo cyangwa hafi y’akayira k’abanyamaguru (ntibirenze cm 50).

questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zitwara abantu gifite ubuso bw’ubururu.

questions.explanation: Ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa n'icyapa cyera cya mpande enye (cm 30 uruhande) n'uruzitiro ku mpera y’iburyo.

questions.question: Iyo mu muhanda, imirimo yihariye ubugari butuma abayobozi bagomba kuva mu mwanya wabo usanzwe kugirango bakomeze urugendo, ahategetswe kunyurwa hagaragazwa n’ikimenyetso gishyirwa aho imirimo irangirira mu ruhande rugenderwamo. Icyo kimenyetso kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
options: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umutuku n’umukara
questions.answer: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
questions.explanation: Ikimenyetso cyo kunyurwa aho imirimo irangirira gifite umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara.

questions.question: Icyapa cyerekana ko hari amabwiriza yihariye mu buryo bwo kugendera mu cyambu cyangwa ku kibuga cy’indege giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
options: ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umukara
ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
ishusho y’uruziga mu ibara ry’ubururu ni ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.answer: ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
questions.explanation: Icyapa cy’amabwiriza yihariye mu cyambu/kibuga cy’indege gifite ishusho mpandenye, ubuso ubururu n’ikirango cyera.

questions.question: Nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba gutuma izo numero zisomerwa nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ribonesha numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba kugaragara mu ntera ya m 20 nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Ibyapa byerekana icyago cyidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa aho berekeza umuhanda nk’igihe cy’impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu muhanda birangwa n’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa by’icyago cyidahoraho (impanuka, imirimo) birangwa n’umweru n’umukara.

questions.question: Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y’ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
options: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Kubangamira imigendere isanzwe birabujijwe kubera kugabanya umuvuduko budasanzwe cyangwa gukacira feri bitari ngombwa.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma itara ry’ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara ry’umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara risa n’icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma
questions.explanation: Romoruki igomba kugaragazwa n'itara ryera, ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije inyuma.

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
options: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe hose kandi umuyobozi ashobora kubona nibura mu ntera ingana na metero 200
iyo ikinyabiziga gikurikiye mu ntambwe zitagera muri m100 keretse iyo umuyobozi wacyo ashaka kunyura kucyo akurikiye acana azimya vuba vuba amatara maremare
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Amatara maremare azimwa iyo umuhanda umurikiwe neza (m 200) cyangwa iyo ugiye kubisikana n’ikinyabiziga gikurikiye.

questions.question: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bidatuma umuyobozi abona neza imbere ye, uwo muyobozi agomba gukora ibi bikurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bituma umuyobozi adabona neza, agomba gushaka umuherekeza cyangwa gukurura ikinyabiziga.

questions.question: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere cyangwa imitunganyirize bwite y’aho, ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini igomba kuba iri aha hakurikira:
options: mu kaboko k’iburyo hakurikijwe aho yaganaga uretse igihe ari mu muhanda w’icyerekezo kimwe
ahegereye bishobotse akayira k’abanyamaguru iyo umuhanda ugafite ariko umwanya w’ibiziga n’akayira ntube urenga santimetero 50
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Ikinyabiziga/inyamaswa ihagaze igomba kuba ku ruhande rw’iburyo cyangwa hafi y’akayira k’abanyamaguru (ntibirenze cm 50).

questions.question: Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa wa velomoteri mu isaha ni:
questions.explanation: Umuvuduko ntarengwa wa velomoteri ni 50 km/h ahatari mu nsisiro.

questions.question: Birabujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira:
options: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Guhagarara akanya kanini birabujijwe mu duhanda tw’abanyamagare na twa velomoteri.

questions.question: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kutamurika mu bihe bikurikira:
options: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe umuyobozi abasha kureba muri m 200
questions.explanation: Amatara maremare azimwa iyo umuhanda umurikiwe neza (m 200), igihe ugiye kubisikana, cyangwa mu nsisiro.

questions.question: Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n’igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.explanation: Ubugari ntarengwa bwa romoruki ikuruwe n’igare cyangwa velomoteri ni cm 125.

questions.question: Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza bwitwa:
questions.explanation: Feri yo gutabara (emergency brake) ikoreshwa igihe feri y’urugendo idakora neza.

questions.question: Nta mwanya n’umwe feri ifungiraho ushobora kurekurana n’ibiziga keretse:
options: iyo bireba feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini, ubwo kurekurana bikaba bidashoboka bidakozwe n'umuyobozi
questions.answer: iyo bireba feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini, ubwo kurekurana bikaba bidashoboka bidakozwe n'umuyobozi
questions.explanation: Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini ntikurekurana n’ibiziga kugira ngo ikomeze imodoka.

questions.question: Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenze abiri y’ubwoko bumwe keretse kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Amatara arenze abiri y’ubwoko bumwe birabujijwe uretse ndangamubyimba, ryerekana icyerekezo, ndangaburumbarare.

questions.question: Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa hafi y’inguni y’ibumoso y’ikinyabiziga.

questions.question: Nibura ikinyabiziga gitegetswe kugira uduhanagurabirahuri dukurikira:
questions.explanation: Ikinyabiziga gitegetswe uduhanagurabirahuri (windscreen wiper) tumwe nibura.

questions.question: Ibiziga by’ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri n’ibya velomoteri kimwe n’ibya romoruki zabyo bigomba kuba byambaye inziga zihagwa zifite amano n’ubujyakuzimu butari munsi ya milimetero imwe ku migongo yabyo yose, n’ubudodo bwabyo ntibugire ahantu na hamwe bugaragara kandi ntibugire aho byacitse bikomeye mu mpande zabyo. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
options: ibinyabiziga bidapakiye kandi bitajya birenza umuvuduko wa km 25 mu isaha ahateganye
ibinyabiziga bya police bijya ahatarenga km 25 uvuye aho biba
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Inziga zihagwa ntizikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bidapakiye ≤ 25 km/h na bya police ≤ 25 km/h.

questions.question: Birabujijwe kugenza ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri na za romoruki zikururwa nabyo, iyo ibiziga byambaye inziga zidahagwa cyangwa inziga zikururuka zifite umubyimba uri hasi ya cm 4. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
options: ibinyabiziga bihinga iyo bigendeshwa mu karere katarenga km 25 uvuye aho ziba
questions.explanation: Ibi ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga by’ingabo, bihinga (≤ km 25), na bya police.

questions.question: Imirongo yera iteganye n’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri mu burebure bwawo ugaragaza:
questions.explanation: Imirongo yera iteganye n’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda ni ahanyurwa n’abanyamaguru.

questions.question: Iyo harimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y’imbere y’imodoka abana badafite imyaka ikurikira:
questions.explanation: Abana badafite imyaka 12 ntibemerewe kwicara ku ntebe y’imbere y’imodoka.

questions.question: Iyo ikinyabiziga kitagikora cyangwa cyoherejwe mu mahanga burundu ibyapa ndanga bigomba gukurwaho bikoherezwa mu biro by’imisoro, ibyo bikorwa mu gihe kingana gute:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa ndanga bigomba gukurwaho bikoherezwa mu biro by’imisoro mu mezi abiri iyo ikinyabiziga kitagikora cyangwa cyoherejwe hanze.

questions.question: Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona ku buryo bukurikira:
options: babona gusa ibumoso bwabo iby’ibara ryera
iburyo babona iby’ibara ritukura cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije gusa
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Inkombe zigaragazwa n’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri: ryera ibumoso, ritukura/icunga iburyo.

questions.question: Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure bwawo n’icyapa gifite ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:
questions.explanation: Icyapa cyo kuyobya umuhanda gifite ubuso bw’umweru.

questions.question: Ku mihanda yagenwe na minisitiri ubifite mu nshingano ibyapa biburira n’ibyapa byerekana bigomba kugaragazwa kuva bwije kugera bukeye n’urumuri rwihariye cyangwa amatara ku mihanda cyangwa ibintu ngarurarumuri. Igihe ijuru rikeye intera y’ahagaragara igomba kuba nibura:
questions.explanation: Ibyapa biburira n’ibyerekana bigaragazwa mu ntera ya m 150 igihe ijuru rikeye.

questions.question: Ibizirikisho by’iminyururu cyangwa by’insinga kimwe n’ibindi by’ingoboka bikoreshwa gusa igihe nta kundi umuntu yabigenza kandi nta kindi bigiriwe uretse gusa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigere aho kigomba gukorerwa kandi nturenze na rimwe km 20 mu isaha, ibyo bizirikisho bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
options: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 30 kuri buri ruhande
questions.answer: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 30 kuri buri ruhande
questions.explanation: Ibizirikisho bigaragazwa n’icyapa cyera cya mpande enye (cm 30 kuri buri ruhande).

questions.question: Uretse mu mijyi, kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu n’abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko itatu ni:
questions.explanation: Uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko 3 ni toni 12 ahatari mu mijyi.

questions.question: Uretse mu mujyi kuyindi mihanda yajyenwe na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu, uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu cyangwa irenga hatarimo mukuzungu ni :
questions.explanation: Uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko 3+ (hatarimo makuzungu) ni toni 10 ahatari mu mujyi.

questions.question: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka kuberako ariko zakozwe ni:
questions.explanation: Modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka (non-braking vehicles) zifite umuvuduko ntarengwa wa 70 km/h iyo nta mategeko yihariye.

questions.question: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka kuberako ariko zakozwe ni:
questions.explanation: Umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka ni 70 km/h (nta gisubizo cy’ukuri kirimo mu byavuzwe).

questions.question: Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
options: imbere y’ahantu nyabagendwa hinjirwa n’ahasohokerwa n’abantu benshi
mu muhanda aho ugabanyijemo ibisate bigaragazwa n’imirongo icagaguye
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Guhagarara akanya kanini birabujijwe imbere y’ahantu henshi n’aho ugabanyijemo ibisate.

questions.question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze nk’igihe cy’ibihu cyangwa cy’imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, udutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw’abanyeshuri bari ku murongo bayobowe n’umwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu barenze umwe bagomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira :
options: imbere ni itara ry’umuhondo ritwariwe ibumoso
inyuma ni itara ryumutuku ritwariwe ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’inyuma hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.answer: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri
questions.explanation: Mu bihe bitaboneka neza, udutsiko tw’abanyamaguru bagomba kugaragazwa n'itara ry’umuhondo imbere na ryera inyuma.

questions.question: Imburira zimurika zemerewe gukoreshwa kugirango bamenyeshe umuyobozi ko bagiye kumunyuraho aha hakurikira:
questions.explanation: Imburira zimurika ntizemerewe gukoreshwa mu nsisiro cyangwa hafi y'inyamaswa/amahoni.

questions.question: Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari bufite ibipimo bikurikira bigomba kugira amatara ndangaburumbarare
questions.explanation: Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2.10 bigomba amatara ndangaburumbarare.

questions.question: Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa akagarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze kuburyo igice cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kiba kiri hasi y’ibipimo bikurikira kuva ku butaka igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:
questions.explanation: Igice cyo hasi cy'itara rigomba kuba hejuru ya cm 50 kuva ku butaka iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye.

questions.question: Ahari hejuru cyane y’ubuso bumurika h’amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y’ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:
questions.explanation: Hejuru y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndangambere/ndanganyuma ntirenza m 1.90 iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye.

questions.question: Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n’iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara risa n’icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy’uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
questions.explanation: Itara ry'icyatsi kibisi ryerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso rigomba gushyirwa hafi y'inguni y'ibumoso.

questions.question: Ubugari bw’imizigo yikorewe n’ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe n’ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira ku bugari bw’icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye:
questions.explanation: Ubugari bw'imizigo ku ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga n'romoruki yayo ntiburenza m 1.25.

questions.question: Mu gihe telefone yawe ihamagawe utwaye imodoka wakora iki?
options: B na c ni ibisubizo byukuri
questions.explanation: Utwaye imodoka ugomba guhagarara aho bishoboka cyangwa gushyira imodoka iruhande ukayitaba; kwitaba utahagaraye birabujijwe.

questions.question: Mu gihe telefone yawe ihamagawe utwaye imodoka wakora iki?
options: B na c ni ibisubizo byukuri
questions.explanation: Kwitaba telefone utahagaraye birabujijwe; ugomba guhagarara cyangwa gushyira imodoka iruhande ukayitaba.

questions.question: Niki wakora mbere y’uko uhindura icyerekezo?
options: Gutanga ikimenyetso cy’ukuboko no gukoresha amatara ndangacyerekezo.
Itegereze neza niba icyapa kikwemerera guhindura icyerekezo.
questions.explanation: Mbese uhindura icyerekezo, ugomba gutanga ikimenyetso (ukuboko/amatora ndangacyerekezo) kandi urebe icyapa.

questions.question: Niki muribi wakwirinda mugihe ushaka kunyuranaho?
options: Nyuma y’ikona ugategereza kubona uburyo bwo kunyuranaho.
Aho utagomba kurenza ibirometero 30 mu isaha.
questions.answer: Nyuma y’ikona ugategereza kubona uburyo bwo kunyuranaho.
questions.explanation: Umunyuranaho akwiriye kwirinda kunyura nyuma y'ikona (blind spot) atarebye neza.

questions.question: Mugihe ukurikiranye na romoruki,n’ukubera iki ugomba gusiga umwanya uhagije hagati yawe nayo?
options: Bifasha umuyobozi wa romoruki kukurebera mundorerwamo.
questions.answer: Bifasha umuyobozi wa romoruki kukurebera mundorerwamo.
questions.explanation: Umwanya uhagije hagati y'imodoka na romoruki ufasha umuyobozi wa romoruki kukureba neza mu ndorerwano.

questions.question: Utegereje gukata iburyo kwiherezo ry’umuhanda.ukingirijwe nimodoka ihagaze.niki wakora?
options: Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.
Kwihuta wegera imbere aho ushobora kureba ugafunga ikindi cyerekezo.
Gutegereza abanyamaguru bakakumenyesha ko ntakibazo wakata.
Guhindukiza imodoka vuba kugirango ushake indi nzira wakoresha.
questions.answer: Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.
questions.explanation: Ugomba guhagarara, ugende gake witonze kugira ngo urebe neza icyerekezo cy'iburyo.

questions.question: Mugihe uri murugendo rurerure mumuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi.niki wakora mugihe wumva utangiye kugira ibitotsi?
options: Kwihuta cyane kugirango usoze urugendo vuba.
Kuva mumuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi, ugahagarara ahantu hatekanye.
questions.answer: Kuva mumuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi, ugahagarara ahantu hatekanye.
questions.explanation: Ibitotsi bigaragaye ugomba guhagarara ahantu hatekanye kugira ngo uruhuke.

questions.question: Kuki ugomba gucana amatara mugihe hatangiye kwijima?
options: Kugira ngo ujyane nabandi bayobozi bibinyabiziga.
Kuko amatara yo ku muhanda ari kwaka
questions.explanation: Amatara y’urugendo acana kugira ngo abandi bayobozi babone ikinyabiziga cyawe neza.

questions.question: Urimo kugenda munzira nyabagendwa ni gute wanyura k’umuyobozi w’igare?
questions.explanation: Ugomba gusiga umwanya uhagije (m 1 nibura) igihe unyura umuyobozi w’igare.

questions.question: Niki wakora igihe utabona neza usubira inyuma ?
options: Gushaka umuntu uri hanze y’ikinyabiziga ukuyobora
questions.explanation: Igihe usubira inyuma ugomba gukoresha akarebanyuma (rear-view mirror) kugira ngo urebe neza.

questions.question: Igihe ukurikiwe n’ikinyabiziga gitwara abarwayi gicanye amatara y’intabaza arabagirana. Wakora iki ?
options: Kugihigamira ako kanya ndetse byaba ngombwa ugahagarara
questions.answer: Kugihigamira ako kanya ndetse byaba ngombwa ugahagarara
questions.explanation: Igihe uhuye n'ikinyabiziga gitwara abarwayi (ambulance) gifite amatara y’intabaza arabagirana, ugomba guhagarara cyangwa kugihigamira ako kanya kugira ngo ugire inzira.

questions.question: Wifuza kugana ibumoso imbere yawe. kubera iki ushaka umwanya mwiza kandi uhagije?
options: Kugirango ubone neza ikindi kerekezo ushaka gufata
Kugirango ufashe abandi bose bakoresha umuhanda icyo ushaka gukora
Kwemerera abandi bayobozi b’ibinyabiziga kukunyura muruhande rw’ibumoso
questions.answer: Kugirango ufashe abandi bose bakoresha umuhanda icyo ushaka gukora
questions.explanation: Ugomba gusiga umwanya uhagije mbere yo guhindura icyerekezo ibumoso kugira ngo ufashe abandi bayobozi b’ibinyabiziga.

questions.question: Utwaye ikinyabiziga inyuma ya romoruki. umuyobozi wayo akaguha ikimenyetso cyo kumutambukaho iburyo kandi ugana ibumoso, wakora iki ?
options: Kugumana umuvuduko wari ufite ukamuvugiriza ihoni
questions.explanation: Iyo umuyobozi wa romoruki akwemerera kumunyuraho iburyo, ugomba kugabanya umuvuduko kandi ukareka akagenda mbere.

questions.question: Wegereye inzira y’abanyamaguru ugasanga bategereje kwambuka. Ugomba gukora iki?
options: Kureka abakuze n’abafite ubumuga bagatambuka mbere
questions.explanation: Ugomba kugabanya umuvuduko kandi witegure guhagarara kugira ngo abanyamaguru bambuke neza.

questions.question: Uri hafi kunyura k’umuyobozi w’ikinyamitende. Muri ibi byapa bikurikira nikihe wakwitondera?
questions.explanation: Ugomba kwitondera icyapa cyerekana ko kunyuranaho ibumoso birabujijwe ku binyamitende.

questions.question: Kumanywa urumuri rudahagije hatabona neza .Ni ayahe matara y’urugendo ugomba gukoresha.
options: Amatara yo kubisika na matara kamena-bihu.
questions.explanation: Ku manywa urumuri rudahagije ugomba gukoresha amatara kamena-bihu y’imbere.
